headline: Valero Energy Corporation Announces CFO Transition
summary: SAN ANTONIO, October 29, 2025--Valero Energy Corporation (NYSE: VLO, "Valero") announced today that Homer Bhullar, who has served as Valero’s Vice President-Investor Relations and Finance since April 29, 2021, has been appointed by Valero’s Board of Directors to serve as Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, effective January 1, 2026. Mr. Bhullar will succeed Jason Fraser, who will remain as Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer until his retirement from the position

raw.headline: Valero Energy Corporation Announces CFO Transition
raw.summary: SAN ANTONIO, October 29, 2025--Valero Energy Corporation (NYSE: VLO, "Valero") announced today that Homer Bhullar, who has served as Valero’s Vice President-Investor Relations and Finance since April 29, 2021, has been appointed by Valero’s Board of Directors to serve as Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, effective January 1, 2026. Mr. Bhullar will succeed Jason Fraser, who will remain as Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer until his retirement from the position

headline: Valero Energy Corporation Declares Regular Cash Dividend on Common Stock
summary: SAN ANTONIO, October 29, 2025--The Board of Directors of Valero Energy Corporation (NYSE: VLO, "Valero") has declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of $1.13 per share on its common stock. The dividend will be payable on December 18, 2025, to shareholders of record as of the close of business on November 20, 2025.
